ygData.subject: RE: Sonorus clouding and Undead
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t bother, you will be decimated.  Even the lowest level ghoul frogs see clean through your invisibility.  Whether they attack you or not due to level
ygData.messageBody:
> Hmmm, I will have to give this a try in Lower Guk. I really need to learn
> that place better.

Don't bother, you will be decimated. Even the lowest level ghoul
frogs see clean through your invisibility. Whether they attack you
or not due to level is a different story, which is where this whole
thread gets blurry.

You've got a few situations, assuming invis is up and working:

MobRed cons indifferent to you, invis worked.
MobRed cons scowls, doesnt attack, invis didnt work, nonagro mob.
(shadowmen fit this bill, they scowl but wont kos players)
MobRed cons scowls and attacks, invis didnt work.
MobGreen cons indifferent to you, invis worked.
MobGreen cons scowls, doesnt attack, your level is affecting this.
(could also be the nonagro mob syndrome, shadowmen for example)
MobGreen cons scowls and attacks, invis didnt work.

Some creatures have permanent see invis, some creatures anything
that is not 'Invis to Undead' doesn't work, some creatures 'Camo'
line of spells doesn't work, some creatures have see invis spell
cast on them, and so on.

I never rely on our invis song to get me by creatures I don't
consider living or alive. Plus the undead scare the crap out
of me even if they are L10. Surround sound speakers and subwoofer,
make those zombies jump out at ya ;)

Harmonic.
